level1_headings.text: All products sold by 1StMiningRig have up to 3 years warranty, depends on manufacturer. All warranties for components will be supported directly by the manufacturer towards the end user.

Warranty does not cover damage resulting from accidents, misuse, neglect or noticeable change in the appearance or operation of the returned equipment. Any graphics card showing traces of overclocking beyond the manufacturer’s recommendations will lose all warranty rights.

All products sold by 1StMiningRig have up to 3 years warranty, depends on manufacturer. All warranties for components will be supported directly by the manufacturer towards the end user.
Warranty does not cover damage resulting from accidents, misuse, neglect or noticeable change in the appearance or operation of the returned equipment. Any graphics card showing traces of overclocking beyond the manufacturer’s recommendations will lose all warranty rights

1StMiningRig shall under no circumstances be liable for any indirect consequential, special incidental loss or damage however resulting from the supply of the Goods. 1StMiningRig’s liability for loss directly resulting shall be limited and shall under no circumstances exceed the amount received by 1StMingRig for the Goods.

Any claim against 1StMiningRig under this contract of sale or for negligence must be made in writing within one (1) calendar month in which the Purchaser becomes aware or ought to have become aware of the events giving rise to the claim.
Nothing in these Terms and Conditions shall affect 1StMiningRig’s liability for death or personal injury caused by its own negligence or that of its employees or agents.
